column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. It's perfect for any event: birthday
column4: or just brunch. The tapas are delicious as well as their sangria. Some of my favorites are the bacon wrapped dates
column6: and the red sangria. Book ahead if going on a Friday or Saturday because the place is always packed. I've had some of my best memories here. This place has changed my mind on tapas.
